data.message: How come EVERYTIME when theres a cipher or a session he has to cut the dope beat off that everyone else was murdering  when it comes to him? How can you be the biggest emcee from Detroit an never rhymed on a Dilla track? Never rhymed on a Premier track and your homeboy Royce does a whole album with him? Make hip hop but never gets played on urban radio or anywhere else they represent the culture? Where are your jams at? Ijs.
